title: Red's Throw
summaries: Red's Throw is a Expert Mode-exclusive yoyo. It is obtainable from any Hardmode boss's Treasure Bag as part of Red's set. Like certain other yoyos, Red's Throw can be held in the air indefinitely.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.

statistics.Sell: 4
